advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

灵感卡片——让创意随行，捕捉您生活中的每个灵感瞬间。

这款简约实用的笔记应用，专为帮助您高效记录、整理和管理灵感而设计。无论您是在工作学习中，还是在日常生活中，小灵感都能成为您的得力助手。

一次下载，终身免费试用。

主要功能：

灵活笔记：轻松创建、编辑和整理笔记，支持添加标签、排序和多种显示方式（单列、双列、三列）。
语音笔记：碎碎念的福音。
笔记关联：让有趣的笔记在一起。
极简主题：提供多种极简主题，让您的笔记更美观大方，呈现出最佳阅读效果。
笔记置顶与分享：随时查看重要信息，将笔记置顶，一键分享至社交平台与好友共享创意。
字体调整：自由调整字体大小，适应不同阅读需求，提高阅读舒适度。
支持check list：流畅的原生交互体验
跨平台支持：
小灵感支持多平台（手机、平板等），后续提供实时云同步功能，确保您的笔记数据安全，随时随地访问。

快来下载灵感卡片，让创意随行，一起探索无限可能！

cn.description:
你是否厌倦了 YouTube 视频中的广告打扰

全新的 YouTube PlayNav 视频浏览器将屏蔽观看视频时出现的所有侵入式广告 让你可以流畅无阻地享受喜爱的视频

此外 我们的应用还提供你会喜欢的功能

• 画中画播放 在使用其他应用时观看 YouTube 视频
• 仅音频模式 在锁屏状态下播放任何 YouTube 视频的音频
• 自动关闭 设置睡眠定时器 Premium
• 循环模式 自动重复播放你最喜欢的视频 Premium
• 学习模式 通过字幕学习语言 Premium

此外 还包括播放列表 速度调整 相关视频 AirPlay 等实用功能 让你的观影体验更上一层楼

如何使用 PlayNav

画中画播放 PIP (Premium)

在使用其他应用时观看 YouTube 视频 启用后播放器会缩小到屏幕上 你可以随意移动或双击隐藏它

如何启用
1 播放视频时 点击左上角的 PIP 图标 两个小屏幕图标
2 视频播放时 从 iPhone 底部向上滑动 播放器将出现在屏幕上

仅音频模式

在 iPhone 屏幕锁定的情况下 收听你最喜欢的 YouTube 视频音频 可用于运动 散步 或睡前 搭配自动关闭功能 让你放松聆听喜爱的视频

如何启用
1 启用画中画播放
2 然后锁定 iPhone 音频将继续播放

自动关闭

睡觉时间 到 YouTube 选择你喜欢的视频或播放列表 设置自动关闭计时器 让你在喜爱的音频陪伴下入睡

如何启用
1 在播放器中点击睡眠图标 月亮
2 选择自动关闭的时间
3 可与仅音频模式结合使用

循环模式 重复播放视频

想让你的视频循环播放 启用循环模式 让视频无限循环播放 还可与仅音频模式结合使用

如何启用
1 点击循环图标 视频将持续循环播放 直到你手动关闭

学习模式 通过字幕学习语言

现在 你可以通过字幕学习语言 启用学习模式后 你将看到原始字幕和你的语言翻译 还可以调整播放速度 更好地理解每个单词

如何启用
1 搜索你学习语言的视频
2 视频播放后 点击标题旁的学习模式按钮

– 现在试用 PLAYNAV！–

免费享受所有基础功能，并通过一次性购买解锁 Premium 功能。

最低要求
• iOS 15 或更高版本
• 3G 或更快的网络连接

hk.description:
《貪婪洞窟》全新英雄[猿神]悟空出世，獨特雙符文圖紙效果，掃平洞窟一切妖魔鬼怪。

【簡介】
《貪婪洞窟》是一款地牢探險Roguelike手游。遊戲整體畫風神秘而詭異，共有4種不同難度，400層隨機地形迷宮，60多種不同的怪物和BOSS，300多件隨機屬性的可收集裝備， 20000+字的線索式劇情。還有更多獨特有趣的玩法等你發現！

【遊戲背景】
在崇尚刀劍與魔法的彌爾頓大陸，一名冒險者在廢棄多年的礦坑中發現了大量的金子和財寶，一夜之間他收穫了從未想像的財富和名聲。
消息隨著北風迅速吹遍了整個大陸，各地的人蜂擁至此地卻又心懷鬼胎。
你，芸芸眾生中的一個普通年輕人，也帶著旁人看不透的目的，來到了這個地方……

【遊戲特色】
-探索隨機洞窟
你永遠不知道下一層洞窟會有什麼——寶藏、迷霧、陷阱、密室？還是強大首領？遊戲中充滿了不確定性，玩家只有依靠自己的計謀與膽量，才能以最小的犧牲換取最大的收穫。

-找尋捲軸 及時逃脫
逃脫捲軸是你離開洞窟唯一的物品，請務必盡快找到它！因為在洞窟內死亡後你將一無所獲——所有辛苦打怪升級的經驗、守財奴般積攢的金幣、讓你欣喜若狂的頂級寶物都將伴隨你的死亡埋葬。

-寶箱遍地也暗藏殺機
在洞窟中有許多奇珍異寶等你發現，密室寶藏更不能錯過。但是要小心那些看守寶藏的怪物，它們可是等著你上鉤呢！甚至還有偽裝成寶箱的怪物，讓你防不勝防！

-角色養成 裝備收集
在洞窟中消滅怪物能提升角色等級，合理分配屬性點與技能點將讓你更加從容面對洞窟的危險；升級、改造、附魔、點金你的裝備，以面對更具難度的探險，甚至挑戰邪惡首領，解開埋藏在洞窟的無盡秘密！

-寵物相伴 一起冒險
全新上線寵物系統，冒險之旅不再孤獨！在冒險的旅途中，你將會在不同的際遇下，遇上這些寵物。它們各具特色，也有專屬自己的獨特能力，帶上它們一起去冒險吧！

hk.description:
灵感卡片——让创意随行，捕捉您生活中的每个灵感瞬间。

这款简约实用的笔记应用，专为帮助您高效记录、整理和管理灵感而设计。无论您是在工作学习中，还是在日常生活中，小灵感都能成为您的得力助手。

一次下载，终身免费试用。

主要功能：

灵活笔记：轻松创建、编辑和整理笔记，支持添加标签、排序和多种显示方式（单列、双列、三列）。
语音笔记：碎碎念的福音。
笔记关联：让有趣的笔记在一起。
极简主题：提供多种极简主题，让您的笔记更美观大方，呈现出最佳阅读效果。
笔记置顶与分享：随时查看重要信息，将笔记置顶，一键分享至社交平台与好友共享创意。
字体调整：自由调整字体大小，适应不同阅读需求，提高阅读舒适度。
支持check list：流畅的原生交互体验
跨平台支持：
小灵感支持多平台（手机、平板等），后续提供实时云同步功能，确保您的笔记数据安全，随时随地访问。

快来下载灵感卡片，让创意随行，一起探索无限可能！

隐私条款：https://www.yuque.com/woshixiongda/vdwyc2/gpyq6twirk1u9w2u

hk.description:
你是否厭倦了 YouTube 影片中的廣告打擾

全新的 YouTube PlayNav 影片瀏覽器將屏蔽觀看影片時出現的所有侵入式廣告，讓你可以流暢無阻地享受喜愛的影片

此外，我們的應用還提供你會喜歡的功能

• 畫中畫播放：在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片
• 僅音頻模式：在鎖屏狀態下播放任何 YouTube 影片的音頻
• 自動關閉：設置睡眠計時器（Premium）
• 循環模式：自動重複播放你最喜歡的影片（Premium）
• 學習模式：通過字幕學習語言（Premium）

此外，還包括播放清單、速度調整、相關影片、AirPlay 等實用功能，讓你的觀影體驗更上一層樓

如何使用 PlayNav

畫中畫播放（PIP）(Premium)

在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片。啟用後播放器會縮小到螢幕上，你可以隨意移動或雙擊隱藏它

如何啟用
	1.	播放影片時，點擊左上角的 PIP 圖示（兩個小螢幕圖示）
	2.	影片播放時，從 iPhone 底部向上滑動，播放器將顯示在螢幕上

僅音頻模式

在 iPhone 螢幕鎖定的情況下，收聽你最喜歡的 YouTube 影片音頻。可用於運動、散步或睡前。搭配自動關閉功能，讓你放鬆聆聽喜愛的影片

如何啟用
	1.	啟用畫中畫播放
	2.	然後鎖定 iPhone，音頻將繼續播放

自動關閉

睡覺時間？到 YouTube 選擇你喜歡的影片或播放清單，設置自動關閉計時器，讓你在喜愛的音頻陪伴下入睡

如何啟用
	1.	在播放器中點擊睡眠圖示（月亮）
	2.	選擇自動關閉的時間
	3.	可與僅音頻模式結合使用

循環模式（重複播放影片）

想讓你的影片循環播放嗎？啟用循環模式，讓影片無限循環播放。也可與僅音頻模式結合使用

如何啟用
	1.	點擊重複圖示，影片將持續循環播放，直到你手動關閉

學習模式（通過字幕學習語言）

現在，你可以通過字幕學習語言！啟用學習模式後，你將看到原始字幕和你的語言翻譯。還可以調整播放速度，更好地理解每個單詞

如何啟用
	1.	搜索你學習語言的影片
	2.	影片播放後，點擊標題旁的學習模式按鈕

– 現在試用 PLAYNAV！–

免費享受所有基本功能，並通過一次性購買解鎖 Premium 功能。

最低要求
• iOS 15 或更高版本
• 3G 或更快的網路連接

hk.releaseNotes:
• TRY BEFORE YOU BUY — Play the first mission for free, then unlock the full game with a single in-app purchase.
• Makes a number of additional improvements and minor bug fixes
hk.description:
PLAY THE FIRST MISSION FOR FREE
Begin your killer career with the first of Blood Money’s massively replayable sandbox missions, then unlock the complete game with a single in-app purchase.

===

You are Agent 47 — a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, “The Franchise”.

Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracy’s lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected.

Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic — complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support.

EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING
Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Money’s sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs.

THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL
Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic “accidents”. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff.
 
INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE
The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways — the hallmarks of a professional assassin.

ONE STEP AHEAD
An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion.

COMPLETE CONTROL
Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips.

===

We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money — Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:

 • iPhone 8 Plus and later
 • iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later

Supported iPads:

 • iPad mini 5 (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3 (2019) and later
 • iPad 7 (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only
 • iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

mo.trackName: 王國保衛戰：起源 Kingdom Rush Origins
mo.description:
"***2015年DICE最佳行動遊戲提名***

最讓人愛不釋手的塔防遊戲，全新冒險前傳重磅回歸——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：起源》！

《王國保衛戰》系列廣受好評：iPhone, iPod touch與iPad上排名第一的戰略遊戲系列，獲得Apple編輯推薦獎、IGN編輯推薦獎、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、GameInformer金獎、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、CNET最佳iPad遊戲、CNET編輯推薦獎、Gamezebo評分4.5/5、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、Venturebeat評分94/100。

看看大家怎麼評價《王國保衛戰：起源》：

「《王國保衛戰》系列是最讚的塔防系列遊戲之一，第三部的“起源”還是那麼好玩。」——美國《娛樂周刊》 

「這些年我玩了很多塔防遊戲，但是沒有一款遊戲像《王國保衛戰》系列這樣抓住了我的心。」——The Verge 

「《王國保衛戰：起源》高清版保留了原汁原味的內容，簡直完美。」——148Apps 

「畫面精美，玩法超棒，音樂好聽，還有趣味彩蛋。喜歡塔防遊戲的玩家，一定要下載這一款遊戲。」——TUAW 

「這款讓人沉浸的塔防遊戲，能滿足你所有對新遊戲的期待：新的防禦塔、新的英雄，還有超讚的玩法。」——Kotaku 

「如果你愛好塔防遊戲，你應該熟悉《王國保衛戰》和它的續作《王國保衛戰：前線》。第三部作品現已發佈，沒錯，它就是迄今為止最讚的作品。」——Gamezebo 

《王國保衛戰：起源》是獲獎遊戲《王國保衛戰》冒險系列的第三部作品，受到數百萬玩家的喜愛，贏得全球遊戲玩家和評論的讚賞。在威之難企圖用力量寶石威脅王國之前，踏上回到起點的旅程，體驗更多快如閃電、引人入勝的玩法，一切都使這款作品成為塔防遊戲的重要基石。在這部激動人心的續作中，憑藉全新的防禦塔、英雄和法術，指揮你的精靈軍隊，守護神秘的土地，免受海蛇、邪惡巫師和一大波豺狼部落族人的侵擾，消滅全部壞蛋。

《王國保衛戰：起源》帶來有趣的新內容與功能，同時保留了眾多玩家喜愛的標誌性視覺元素。

遊戲特色 
· 重返《王國保衛戰》的世界：探訪神秘的精靈森林、神奇的仙境和古城的浮空遺跡！
· 用全新的防禦塔和部隊釋放精靈的力量！精靈弓箭手、秘法師、石環德魯伊和精靈步兵一起組成軍隊的中堅 
· 發現具有18種技能的8個新防禦塔特別升級！讓精靈射手、符文巨熊、魔法巫師和精靈巨樹為你消滅敵人。
· 拿起武器，對抗30種敵人，加入史詩級頭目戰鬥！正面抗擊成群的豺狼人、巨型蜘蛛和可怕的暮光軍隊。
· 掌控升級16個傳奇英雄和他們強大的力量與法術！
· 施出雷電，召喚援軍，用每個英雄獨特的力量去消滅大批敵人！
· 70個成就、新手與老玩家都可選擇3種難度模式，讓你沉浸在快樂的遊戲中。
· 體驗不同的遊戲模式——經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式——證明自己戰術大師的勇氣。
· 在升級的地精商店內，用轉去的寶石購買全新升級的裝備。
· 參考百科全書了解你的敵人和防禦塔"

mo.description:
你是否厭倦了 YouTube 影片中的廣告打擾

全新的 YouTube PlayNav 影片瀏覽器將屏蔽觀看影片時出現的所有侵入式廣告，讓你可以流暢無阻地享受喜愛的影片

此外，我們的應用還提供你會喜歡的功能

• 畫中畫播放：在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片
• 僅音頻模式：在鎖屏狀態下播放任何 YouTube 影片的音頻
• 自動關閉：設置睡眠計時器（Premium）
• 循環模式：自動重複播放你最喜歡的影片（Premium）
• 學習模式：通過字幕學習語言（Premium）

此外，還包括播放清單、速度調整、相關影片、AirPlay 等實用功能，讓你的觀影體驗更上一層樓

如何使用 PlayNav

畫中畫播放（PIP）(Premium)

在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片。啟用後播放器會縮小到螢幕上，你可以隨意移動或雙擊隱藏它

如何啟用
	1.	播放影片時，點擊左上角的 PIP 圖示（兩個小螢幕圖示）
	2.	影片播放時，從 iPhone 底部向上滑動，播放器將顯示在螢幕上

僅音頻模式

在 iPhone 螢幕鎖定的情況下，收聽你最喜歡的 YouTube 影片音頻。可用於運動、散步或睡前。搭配自動關閉功能，讓你放鬆聆聽喜愛的影片

如何啟用
	1.	啟用畫中畫播放
	2.	然後鎖定 iPhone，音頻將繼續播放

自動關閉

睡覺時間？到 YouTube 選擇你喜歡的影片或播放清單，設置自動關閉計時器，讓你在喜愛的音頻陪伴下入睡

如何啟用
	1.	在播放器中點擊睡眠圖示（月亮）
	2.	選擇自動關閉的時間
	3.	可與僅音頻模式結合使用

循環模式（重複播放影片）

想讓你的影片循環播放嗎？啟用循環模式，讓影片無限循環播放。也可與僅音頻模式結合使用

如何啟用
	1.	點擊重複圖示，影片將持續循環播放，直到你手動關閉

學習模式（通過字幕學習語言）

現在，你可以通過字幕學習語言！啟用學習模式後，你將看到原始字幕和你的語言翻譯。還可以調整播放速度，更好地理解每個單詞

如何啟用
	1.	搜索你學習語言的影片
	2.	影片播放後，點擊標題旁的學習模式按鈕

– 現在試用 PLAYNAV！–

免費享受所有基本功能，並通過一次性購買解鎖 Premium 功能。

mo.releaseNotes:
• TRY BEFORE YOU BUY — Play the first mission for free, then unlock the full game with a single in-app purchase.
• Makes a number of additional improvements and minor bug fixes
mo.description:
PLAY THE FIRST MISSION FOR FREE
Begin your killer career with the first of Blood Money’s massively replayable sandbox missions, then unlock the complete game with a single in-app purchase.

===

You are Agent 47 — a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, “The Franchise”.

Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracy’s lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected.

Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic — complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support.

EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING
Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Money’s sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs.

THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL
Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic “accidents”. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff.
 
INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE
The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways — the hallmarks of a professional assassin.

ONE STEP AHEAD
An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion.

COMPLETE CONTROL
Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips.

===

We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money — Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:

 • iPhone 8 Plus and later
 • iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later

Supported iPads:

 • iPad mini 5 (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3 (2019) and later
 • iPad 7 (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only
 • iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

tw.description:
《貪婪洞窟》全新英雄[猿神]悟空出世，獨特雙符文圖紙效果，掃平洞窟一切妖魔鬼怪。

【簡介】
《貪婪洞窟》是一款地牢探險Roguelike手游。遊戲整體畫風神秘而詭異，共有4種不同難度，400層隨機地形迷宮，60多種不同的怪物和BOSS，300多件隨機屬性的可收集裝備， 20000+字的線索式劇情。還有更多獨特有趣的玩法等你發現！

【遊戲背景】
在崇尚刀劍與魔法的彌爾頓大陸，一名冒險者在廢棄多年的礦坑中發現了大量的金子和財寶，一夜之間他收穫了從未想像的財富和名聲。
消息隨著北風迅速吹遍了整個大陸，各地的人蜂擁至此地卻又心懷鬼胎。
你，芸芸眾生中的一個普通年輕人，也帶著旁人看不透的目的，來到了這個地方……

【遊戲特色】
-探索隨機洞窟
你永遠不知道下一層洞窟會有什麼——寶藏、迷霧、陷阱、密室？還是強大首領？遊戲中充滿了不確定性，玩家只有依靠自己的計謀與膽量，才能以最小的犧牲換取最大的收穫。

-找尋捲軸 及時逃脫
逃脫捲軸是你離開洞窟唯一的物品，請務必盡快找到它！因為在洞窟內死亡後你將一無所獲——所有辛苦打怪升級的經驗、守財奴般積攢的金幣、讓你欣喜若狂的頂級寶物都將伴隨你的死亡埋葬。

-寶箱遍地也暗藏殺機
在洞窟中有許多奇珍異寶等你發現，密室寶藏更不能錯過。但是要小心那些看守寶藏的怪物，它們可是等著你上鉤呢！甚至還有偽裝成寶箱的怪物，讓你防不勝防！

-角色養成 裝備收集
在洞窟中消滅怪物能提升角色等級，合理分配屬性點與技能點將讓你更加從容面對洞窟的危險；升級、改造、附魔、點金你的裝備，以面對更具難度的探險，甚至挑戰邪惡首領，解開埋藏在洞窟的無盡秘密！

-寵物相伴 一起冒險
全新上線寵物系統，冒險之旅不再孤獨！在冒險的旅途中，你將會在不同的際遇下，遇上這些寵物。它們各具特色，也有專屬自己的獨特能力，帶上它們一起去冒險吧！

tw.releaseNotes: 在此版本中，我們修復了透過連結搜尋 YouTube 影片的問題。
tw.description:
你是否厭倦了 YouTube 影片中的廣告打擾

全新的 YouTube PlayNav 影片瀏覽器將屏蔽觀看影片時出現的所有侵入式廣告，讓你可以流暢無阻地享受喜愛的影片

此外，我們的應用還提供你會喜歡的功能

• 畫中畫播放：在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片
• 僅音頻模式：在鎖屏狀態下播放任何 YouTube 影片的音頻
• 自動關閉：設置睡眠計時器（Premium）
• 循環模式：自動重複播放你最喜歡的影片（Premium）
• 學習模式：通過字幕學習語言（Premium）

此外，還包括播放清單、速度調整、相關影片、AirPlay 等實用功能，讓你的觀影體驗更上一層樓

如何使用 PlayNav

畫中畫播放（PIP）(Premium)

在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片。啟用後播放器會縮小到螢幕上，你可以隨意移動或雙擊隱藏它

如何啟用
	1.	播放影片時，點擊左上角的 PIP 圖示（兩個小螢幕圖示）
	2.	影片播放時，從 iPhone 底部向上滑動，播放器將顯示在螢幕上

僅音頻模式

在 iPhone 螢幕鎖定的情況下，收聽你最喜歡的 YouTube 影片音頻。可用於運動、散步或睡前。搭配自動關閉功能，讓你放鬆聆聽喜愛的影片

如何啟用
	1.	啟用畫中畫播放
	2.	然後鎖定 iPhone，音頻將繼續播放

自動關閉

睡覺時間？到 YouTube 選擇你喜歡的影片或播放清單，設置自動關閉計時器，讓你在喜愛的音頻陪伴下入睡

如何啟用
	1.	在播放器中點擊睡眠圖示（月亮）
	2.	選擇自動關閉的時間
	3.	可與僅音頻模式結合使用

循環模式（重複播放影片）

想讓你的影片循環播放嗎？啟用循環模式，讓影片無限循環播放。也可與僅音頻模式結合使用

如何啟用
	1.	點擊重複圖示，影片將持續循環播放，直到你手動關閉

學習模式（通過字幕學習語言）

現在，你可以通過字幕學習語言！啟用學習模式後，你將看到原始字幕和你的語言翻譯。還可以調整播放速度，更好地理解每個單詞

如何啟用
	1.	搜索你學習語言的影片
	2.	影片播放後，點擊標題旁的學習模式按鈕

– 現在試用 PLAYNAV！–

免費享受所有基本功能，並通過一次性購買解鎖 Premium 功能。

最低要求
• iOS 15 或更高版本
• 3G 或更快的網路連接

相關關鍵詞
YouTube、YouTube Music、YouTube Vanced、廣告攔截器、無需訂閱、跳過 YouTube 廣告、無廣告音樂、屏蔽彈窗、YouTube 的 AdBlock、屏蔽彈窗廣告、無廣告內容、高級廣告攔截器、AdBlock Plus、移除廣告、無廣告 YouTube

需要幫助
訪問 playnav.vidiom.app 或聯繫我們 info@playnav.vidiom.app

服務條款 playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service
隱私政策 playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Welcome to RadarOmega, the next-generation weather app that takes high-resolution weather data to a whole new level. More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm.

Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. RadarOmega and cyclonePORT work closely with universities, emergency managers, broadcast meteorologists, and more to provide solutions for relaying critical weather information when life-threatening weather situations are imminent.

RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea.

Base Application

-NEW Hi-Res Storm Relative Velocity
-MRMS Reflectivity
-Hi-Res Single Site Radar Data
-30 Frames of Data

-Lightning Detection/Animation

-Access to cyclonePORT Network

Gamma

-National Digital Forecast Database

-75 Frames of Data

Alpha

-Volumetric Radar

-250 Frames of Data

tw.releaseNotes:
New Features

* WEATHER INTEGRATION: Set your location in the settings to unlock current weather data.

* WEATHER CONDITIONS IN WORKFLOWS: Use live weather data like temperature, humidity, precipitation (amount & probability), UV index, cloud cover, wind speed and visibility as conditions in your Workflows.

* NEW START EVENTS: Trigger Workflows at sunrise or sunset – perfect for automating your home around natural light.

* NEW STEPS: Add more control to your automations with repeat loops and a new wait step that pauses execution until a specific time. You can also just stop an execution.

* RELATIVE VALUE CONTROL & TOGGLE ACCESSORIES: Dynamically increase or decrease device states – like boosting brightness by 10% – or toggle accessories without setting a specific target value.

* SMART FOLDERS FOR WORKFLOWS: Create intelligent folders to quickly filter and organize your Workflows. We’ve also added text search, so you can find what you need even faster.

* ERROR HANDLING: In the Workflow settings, you can now assign a device to be notified in case a Workflow execution fails.

Improvements

* HUB MODE ON MAC: Hub Mode can now be enabled on your Mac.

* ENHANCED WORKFLOW UI: We’ve refined the look and feel of IF/ELSE steps and improved how you add conditions and actions.

* MULTI-DEVICE ACTIONS: A single step can now control multiple devices and their properties, making complex automations even easier to build.

Update now and bring smarter, more dynamic automation to your Apple Home!
tw.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

Privacy Policy: 
https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/

Terms of Use: 
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

tw.releaseNotes:
• TRY BEFORE YOU BUY — Play the first mission for free, then unlock the full game with a single in-app purchase.
• Makes a number of additional improvements and minor bug fixes
tw.description:
PLAY THE FIRST MISSION FOR FREE
Begin your killer career with the first of Blood Money’s massively replayable sandbox missions, then unlock the complete game with a single in-app purchase.

===

You are Agent 47 — a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, “The Franchise”.

Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracy’s lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected.

Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic — complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support.

EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING
Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Money’s sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs.

THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL
Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic “accidents”. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff.
 
INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE
The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways — the hallmarks of a professional assassin.

ONE STEP AHEAD
An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion.

COMPLETE CONTROL
Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips.

===

We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money — Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:

 • iPhone 8 Plus and later
 • iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later

Supported iPads:

 • iPad mini 5 (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3 (2019) and later
 • iPad 7 (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only
 • iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

us.description:
灵感卡片——让创意随行，捕捉您生活中的每个灵感瞬间。

这款简约实用的笔记应用，专为帮助您高效记录、整理和管理灵感而设计。无论您是在工作学习中，还是在日常生活中，小灵感都能成为您的得力助手。

一次下载，终身免费试用。

主要功能：

灵活笔记：轻松创建、编辑和整理笔记，支持添加标签、排序和多种显示方式（单列、双列、三列）。
语音笔记：碎碎念的福音。
笔记关联：让有趣的笔记在一起。

us.description:
Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos?

The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions.

Plus, our app offers features you’ll love:
• On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps.
• Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked.
• Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium)
• Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos.
• Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium)

It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience.

» HOW TO USE PLAYNAV?

ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium)

Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap.

» How to activate it?
1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons).
2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen.

AUDIO-ONLY MODE

Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos!

» How to activate it?
1. Enable On-Screen Playback.
2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing.

AUTO SHUTDOWN

Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep.

» How to activate it?
1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player.
2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown.
3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode.

LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO)

Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode.

» How to activate it?
1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it.

LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE)

Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word.

» How to activate it?
1 Search for videos in the language you are learning.
2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title.

Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase.

PLAY THE FIRST MISSION FOR FREE
Begin your killer career with the first of Blood Money’s massively replayable sandbox missions, then unlock the complete game with a single in-app purchase.

===

You are Agent 47 — a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, “The Franchise”.

Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracy’s lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected.

Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic — complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support.

EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING
Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Money’s sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs.

THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL
Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic “accidents”. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff.
 
INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE
The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways — the hallmarks of a professional assassin.

ONE STEP AHEAD
An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion.

COMPLETE CONTROL
Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips.

tr.description:
Earthquake Network is the most comprehensive app on earthquakes and for most world countries it is the only earthquake early warning system for receiving real time alerts.

Earthquake Network gives you:

- Real time alerts if you live close to the epicentre
- Alerts seconds in advances if you live far from the epicentre
- Real time user reports on felt earthquakes
- Free earthquake data from 21 seismic networks including U.S., Puerto Rico, India, Indonesia, Turkey, Mexico, Chile, Peru, Ecuador, Argentina, Venezuela, Dominican Republic, Colombia, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, China, New Zeland, Japan, Italy, Croatia, Spain and Greece

The Earthquake Network research project (https://www.sismo.app) aims at developing a smartphone-based earthquake early warning system able to detect earthquakes in real time and to alert the population in advance. Smartphones are able to detect earthquakes thanks to the accelerometer on-board each device. When an earthquake is detected, users with the application installed are immediatly alerted. Since earthquake waves travel at around 5 km/s it is possible to alert the population not yet reached by the damaging waves of the earthquake. For the scientific details about the project please refer to the scientific paper on Frontiers at https://bit.ly/2C8B5HI

Subscriptions:

When an earthquake is detected in real time by smartphones near the epicenter, the server sends an alert to all users with the app. Alerting all users can take up to 10 seconds since it is not technically feasible to do so instantly. Now you can join the priority lists of the first 10,000 or 100,000 people alerted in real time. The following subscriptions are available:

- Subscription 10k for 1 year
- Subscription 10k for 1 month 

- Subscription 100k for 1 year
- Subscription 100k for 1 month

tr.description:
In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. 

Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. 

Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. 

It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ...

--------------------------------------------------------
In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters.

Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave...

Game Features
·Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time!                     
·Hundreds of monsters to defeat!
·Hundreds of equipment to collect!
·Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer!
·Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore!

Contact us
bd@avalongames.com.cn
https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

tr.description:
PLAY THE FIRST MISSION FOR FREE
Begin your killer career with the first of Blood Money’s massively replayable sandbox missions, then unlock the complete game with a single in-app purchase.

===

You are Agent 47 — a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, “The Franchise”.

Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracy’s lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected.

Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic — complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support.

EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING
Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Money’s sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs.

THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL
Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic “accidents”. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff.
 
INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE
The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways — the hallmarks of a professional assassin.

ONE STEP AHEAD
An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion.

COMPLETE CONTROL
Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips.

===

We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money — Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:

 • iPhone 8 Plus and later
 • iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later

Supported iPads:

 • iPad mini 5 (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3 (2019) and later
 • iPad 7 (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only
 • iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com
